title: Find the Blood of Lathander
content: he Monastery has 3 different levels. You need to use Jump, Fly, and climb veins to reach different parts of the Monastery. You can find Ceremonial Mace on a drunk Kobold on the first floor of the monastery. You can find Ceremonial Battleaxe after defeating the guardian on the second floor. Ceremonial Warhammer is on the top level, in the Eagle's Nest. (If you help the Blue Jay to take back the nest, he will reveal a loot location for you.)
